# etcd_key (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource etcd_key "test_key" {
  key   = "/test/terraform/key1"
  value = "Hello"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **key** (String) Etcd key
- **value** (String) Etcd value
